about_the_game:
BeetleQuest 2023 is an adventure game inspired by games like King’s Quest and Legends of Kyrandia. It is based on children’s books and fairytales, and is suitable for all ages!

Story

In BeetleQuest, three beetle friends, Magnus, Boris and Dagmar are playing with their most cherished marble, when Boris accidentally shoots it down into a molehill.

The mole inside becomes very angry for he has suffered a huge bump on his head. He refuses to return the marble. He says he will only give the marble back if the beetlefriends give him a nice gift in return.

And so, their quest begins! Off they go to search for a nice gift for the mole so they can get their precious marble back.

Features

* A charming story with lots of point & click goodness.

* Fully hand-drawn backgrounds, characters and animations.
* Three beetles to choose from. Play as Magnus, Dagmar, or Boris.
* Visit exciting places, like a mysterious swamp, a dark cave, and even a land underwater!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 1.8Ghz+ (approx)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-Dedicated (shared) video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: openAL compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Video Card with at least 512MB VRAM & openGL 2.0 support (non-dedicated video cards starting from HD3000 onwards)
  • Sound Card: openAL compatible sound card

short_description: BeetleQuest 2023 is an adventure game about three beetlefriends who go a great adventure together. Visit sunny forests, mysterious swamps, dark caves, and even a land underwater! All beautifully hand-drawn and animated, and filled with point and click goodness!
